title: Reading with Randos: A Grief Observed (Part 1)
description:
This is the first of our readings and reflections on C.S. Lewis' book "A Grief Observed"

Talk to PVK Randos and their ilk here: https://discordapp.com/invite/pmQuHSW

Check out Paul Vanderklay's channel here:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCGsDIP_K6J6VSTqlq-9IPlg

"If We Were Vampires" by Jason Isbell:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fyiEJaf-IzE
